verses:
We gather together to sing the Lord's praises,
To worship the Father through Jesus, his Son.
In this celebration, all sing with jubilation!
We are his holy people whose freedom he won.

We greet our Lord present within our assembly;
We hear the good news announced clearly to all.
With songs of rejoicing our praises we are voicing,
As we invoke God's blessing and answer 
the call.

Since Christ is the vine and his people the branches,
In him we give praise to the Father above.
Christ brings every nation the wonders of salvation,
That all may grow in knowledge, in 
faith, hope, and love.
